sentences.en: A large crowd had gathered despite the lateness of the hour.
sentences.cn: 尽管天色已晚，仍有一大群人聚集到了一起。

sentences.en: Even one minute's lateness would earn a stern rebuke.
sentences.cn: 哪怕迟到一分钟也将受到严厉的斥责.

sentences.en: Everyone else was put to trouble by her lateness.
sentences.cn: 她的迟到给其他人带来了麻烦.

sentences.en: He only offered a partial explanation for his lateness.
sentences.cn: 他对自己迟到只提供了并不完全的解释.

sentences.en: He worked overtime to make up for his lateness for work.
sentences.cn: 他加班以补偿上班迟到.

sentences.en: His lateness was due to the very heavy traffic on the motorway.
sentences.cn: 他迟到是因高速公路上车辆过多所致.

sentences.en: I must report your lateness to the teacher.
sentences.cn: 我必须报告老师你迟到了。

sentences.en: I remember that rich bass voice hanging in the night air, making some elaborate operatic point despite the lateness of the hour - and the train.
sentences.cn: 尽管那次时间已经很晚，再加上火车的隆隆声，我还记得那饱满的低音弥漫在夜空之中，详尽地阐述他关于歌剧的看法 。

sentences.en: I shall have to report you for repeated lateness.
sentences.cn: 你老是迟到,我可要告你了.

sentences.en: Lateness and carelessness are subjects for complaint.
sentences.cn: 迟到与粗心会引起埋怨.

sentences.en: Lateness is discourteous to your classmates and to your professor.
sentences.cn: 迟到是对你同学和教授的不尊敬.

sentences.en: No point credit will be given for unexcused lateness exceeding 5 days.
sentences.cn: 迟交作业超过5天将不可原谅,不会给予分数.

sentences.en: Team members will be penalized for lateness.
The guesthouse in Nanshao was the most pleasant we have come across, run by a welcoming Miao family who despite the lateness of the hour gave us hot water for our feet and hot food for our bellies.
sentences.cn: 南哨的旅馆是我们遇到的最友善的旅馆，由一家好客的苗族人经营。 尽管那天已经很晚，主人还是为我们的双脚提供了热水，为我们的肚子提供了热饭。

sentences.en: The inference I've drawn from his lateness is he overslept.
sentences.cn: 从他来晚我得出的结论是他睡过头了.

sentences.en: The lateness of the ship was due to the storm.
sentences.cn: 船的晚点是由于风暴造成的.

sentences.en: The principal reprimand the student for his chronic lateness.
sentences.cn: 校长斥责那个学生不该接二连三地迟到.

sentences.en: What did he say in explanation of his lateness?
sentences.cn: 他说了些什么来为自己的迟到辩解 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 晚的；迟的；已故的；最近的
